author: cnbc.com
title: Trucking Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ryder System, Schneider National, Werner Enterprises, and YRC Worldwide
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on R, SNDR, WERN, and YRCW which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . These stocks belong to the Trucking sector, which serves as a barometer of the U.S. economy, representing 70.6% of tonnage carried by all modes of domestic freight transportation, including manufactured and retail goods. In today's pre-market research, WallStEquities.com covers the recent performance of Ryder System Inc. (NYSE: R), Schneider National Inc. (NYSE: SNDR), Werner Enterprises Inc. (NASDAQ: WERN), and YRC Worldwide Inc. (NASDAQ: YRCW). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Ryder System
Miami, Florida headquartered Ryder System Inc.'s stock finished Monday's session 2.07% higher at $76.08. A total volume of 583,446 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 536,400 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 0.28% over the past year. The stock is trading 2.03% below its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Ryder System, which provides transportation and supply chain management solutions to small businesses and large enterprises worldwide, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 36.09.
On February 12 th , 2018, Ryder System's Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.52 per share of common stock, to be paid on March 16 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on February 20 th , 2018. Get the full research report on R for free by clicking below at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=R
Schneider National
On Monday, shares in Schneider National Inc. recorded a trading volume of 316,922 shares. The stock ended the session 1.37% higher at $27.33. The Company's shares have advanced 9.89% in the previous three months. The stock is trading 13.41% above its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Schneider National, which provides truckload, intermodal, and logistics services in North America, have an RSI of 47.70.
On January 30 th , 2018, Schneider National announced that its Board of Directors had approved an increase in the Company's quarterly cash dividend from $0.05 to $0.06 per share of its Class A and Class B common stock. The dividend is expected to be paid on April 09 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of March 15 th , 2018. Gain free access to the research report on SNDR at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=SNDR
Werner Enterprises
Omaha, Nebraska headquartered Werner Enterprises Inc.'s shares closed the day 1.97% higher at $38.75. The stock recorded a trading volume of 722,117 shares. The Company's shares have gained 10.09% over the previous three months and 39.39% over the past year. The stock is trading 14.23% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Werner Enterprises, which engages in transporting truckload shipments of general commodities in interstate and intrastate commerce in the US, Mexico, Canada, China, and Australia, have an RSI of 48.99.
On January 30 th , 2018, research firm Cowen reiterated its 'Underperform' rating on the Company's stock with an increase of the target price from $30 a share to $36 a share.
On February 22 nd , 2018, Werner Enterprises announced its designation as a 2018 Military Friendly ® Brand by Victory Media. The Military Friendly ® designation measures an organization's commitment, effort, and success in creating sustainable and meaningful benefits for the military community. Signing up today on Wall St. Equities will give you access to the latest report on WERN at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=WERN
YRC Worldwide
Overland Park, Kansas headquartered YRC Worldwide Inc.'s shares finished 0.64% higher at $9.42. The stock recorded a trading volume of 661,140 shares. The Company's shares are trading 24.05% below their 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of YRC Worldwide, which through its subsidiaries, provides various transportation services primarily in North America, have an RSI of 24.14.
On February 08 th , 2018, YRC Freight, a subsidiary of YRC Worldwide, has once again been recognized by Unishippers Global Logistics, LLC with its 2017 National LTL Carrier Partner of the Year award. The award was presented to the Company at the annual Unishippers convention by Tim Story, Executive Vice President of Freight Operations. Unishippers is a leading provider of third-party logistics services to over 50,000 small and medium-sized businesses. Register now for today's free coverage on YRCW at:
www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=YRCW
--
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.

The non-sponsored content contained herein has been prepared by a writer (the "Author") and is fact checked and reviewed by a third-party research service company (the "Reviewer") represented by a credentialed financial analyst [for further information on analyst credentials, please email info@wallstequities.com . Rohit Tuli, a CFA® charterholder (the "Sponsor"), provides necessary guidance in preparing the document templates.
